attributes.action: stop all payments to the EU and spend Britain's hard earned cash on Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British tax payer is pay out a fortune and getting little in return. Our NHS is in crisis our schools are failing and yet rather than spend money in Britain we appear happy to give billions to the EU and other foreign causes. Before we help others it is about time we looked after ourselves and give british children a chance in the future.
